This method exists solely to test the SDK documentation tool.
See the raw XML.
This sample xml 'include' was created using a CDATA section inside a "code" element.
<Sample> An in-depth look at creating applications with XML, using <, >, </Sample>
While this 'include' uses replacement entities for greater-than and less-than.
<hey>hey hey hey hey</hey>
Both mechanisms work, but the CDATA mechanism is far more readable.
I strongly recommend the use of CDATA sections wherever the display of XML is required.
Some static text.
